tool_description: Get station codes and also get PNR status of indian railways using this easy API, this is developed for educational purposes only and we are not affiliated to indian railways in any form and this is not an official api also.
name: Indian Railways
title: Indian Railways

api_list.name: Find Stations
api_list.description: Get station codes from the station name.

required_parameters.name: station
required_parameters.description: Name of the station for which station codes to be pulled.

api_list.name: PNR Status Check
api_list.description: Just give 10-digit pnr number and get the status.

required_parameters.name: pnr
required_parameters.description: PNR number for which query need to be carried out.
